page.title: 11CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: {Games}played by children at Moore School.{Chasing Games}Witches and Fairies,Horses,Mr.Wolf,Pompom.{Tag {Games}Farmer,farmer may I cross your field,Line tic,Wall tic,Offground tic, Stick in the mud.{Ball Games}Wall or Yard-kicking against wall-if you miss you go on the wall,French netball- throwing and running in a circle, Kingo-person on tries to hit others with ball.{Old favourites}Hopscotch, Skipping,Conkers,Marbles.{Other Games} Poisonous Fingers-players hold fingers of person 'on',who calls out poisonous things eg poisonous sausages.Players hold until poisonous fingers are called.They then run away-first one caught is "on".{Polo}person on chooses theme eg fruit,players each choose one then person 'on' selects one fruit. That 'fruit'and person 'on'race to a given point.Loser is then'on'
